items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for August 27, 2025
items.description: Magic contained within pencils, the art of journaling, what it means to cry, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: Some of My New Favorite Cookbooks
items.description: Since I started collecting cookbooks in my teens, I’ve noticed an uptick in personality. Now there are more stories and personal touches.

items.title: School’s in Session: Professor Mystery & Thrillers
items.description: There are different time periods, areas of education, and two are murder mysteries, while one is a revenge thriller!

items.title: How Do You Shelve Your Comics?
items.description: And is it always useful to put comics with comics and prose with prose?

items.title: Dictators and Strongmen: Oppressive Regimes in Historical Fiction
items.description: These 9 historical fiction books about oppressive regimes will remind you of the importance of standing against tyranny, no matter how hard.
